devdoc.author: dYdX * Oracle which mirrors an underlying oracle.

checkSynced().return: A bitmap of the IDs of signers that need to be added to the mirror.A bitmap of the IDs of signers that need to be removed from the mirror.False if the required number of signers (“bar”) matches, and true otherwise.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: P1MirrorOracle

age().notice: Returns the timetamp of the last update.

bar().notice: Returns the number of signers per poke.

bud(address).notice: Returns 1 if the address is authorized to read the oracle price, and 0 otherwise.

checkSynced().notice: Check whether the list of signers and required number of signers match the underlying oracle.

diss(address).notice: Unauthorize an address so it can no longer read the oracle price.

diss(address[]).notice: Unauthorize addresses so they can no longer read the oracle price.

drop(address[]).notice: Unauthorize signers. The signers must NOT be authorized on the underlying oracle.

kiss(address).notice: Authorize an address to read the oracle price.

kiss(address[]).notice: Authorize addresses to read the oracle price.

lift(address[]).notice: Authorize new signers. The signers must be authorized on the underlying oracle.

orcl(address).notice: Returns 1 if the signer is authorized, and 0 otherwise.

peek().notice: Returns the current price, and a boolean indicating whether the price is nonzero.

poke(uint256[],uint256[],uint8[],bytes32.notice: Send an array of signed messages to update the oracle value. Must have exactly `_BAR_` number of messages.

read().notice: Requires the price to be nonzero, and returns the current price.

setBar().notice: Sync `_BAR_` (the number of required signers) with the underyling oracle contract.

slot(uint8).notice: A mapping from the first byte of an authorized signer's address to the signer.
